name: Calculated hours IS EBI Access Server Configuration
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(IS EIS (EBI) Access Server Configuration:[IF](<*ISSELECTED(IS_Implementation_Methodology.Non-Standard Build Estimate)*>){<* Eval(7*([IF](<*ISSELECTED(IS_Redundant_EIS_(EBI)_Servers.Yes)*>){1}{0}[ENDIF]+<*VALUE(IS_No_of_EIS_(EBI)_Servers_(0-10))*>)) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(IS_Implementation_Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,<*ISSELECTED(IS_GES_Location.None)*>)){<* Eval(7*([IF](<*ISSELECTED(IS_Redundant_EIS_(EBI)_Servers.Yes)*>){1}{0}[ENDIF]+<*VALUE(IS_No_of_EIS_(EBI)_Servers_(0-10))*>)) *>}{<* Eval(7*([IF](<*ISSELECTED(IS_Redundant_EIS_(EBI)_Servers.Yes)*>){1}{0}[ENDIF]+<*VALUE(IS_No_of_EIS_(EBI)_Servers_(0-10))*>)) *>}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
